items.sentence: Tom still believes in trickle-down economics.
Tom is a mighty important figure in our town.
Tom built the whole thing at his own expense.
Tom received the highest grades in the class.
In the heat of the argument, Tom struck John.
Tom took too many liberties when he was here.
Mary is very sick and I'm afraid she's dying.
Don't speak to the driver while he's driving.
We can't depend on Tom to do the right thing.
Tom got arrested and spent the night in jail.
